title: Jar And Cover, ca. 1795
provenance: Newby Murray, New York, gift to WPW (12/58)
dimensions: H x diam.: 18 x 7 cm (7 1/16 x 2 3/4 in.)
description: Urn shaped body with cushioned, domed cover. Flat flutes on stem and lowerportion of jar, band of diamond cuts, and wide band containing garland. Repeated in cover. Tall, faceted finial. Square pedestal base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover, ca. 1795.
ca. 1795. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-216-a,b.
